meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6ES Council Briefing Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the August 27, 2024, Commission on Disabilities Meeting minutes

agenda_items.title: Chairman Report
agenda_items.description: Chairman John Kalkanli will review the Harmonies of Humanities event by Human Rights Dallas on September 7, 2024 and discuss his briefing to the Texas Workforce Solutions, Vocational Rehabilitation Services about the Commission on Disabilities, given on September 9, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Accessible Voting Methods for People with Disabilities
agenda_items.description: Community Outreach Coordinator of the Dallas County Elections Department, J’La Dade, will present on Accessible Voting Methods for People with Disabilities.

agenda_items.title: EmployAbility Career Expo 2024
agenda_items.description: Chair of EmployAbility, Michael Quezada, will present on EmployAbility and their upcoming Career Expo 2024.
